DOC.detailed_description: This protocol consist non-interventional multi-centre , prospective study . The observational study also answer question impact ventricular pace outcome patient implant ICD & CRT-D device ICD & CRT-D device use clinical practice two year follow-up .

Life expectancy le 12 month .
